name: Docks Coleslaw
keywords: green cabbage, red cabbage, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 medium (about 2 1/2 pounds) green cabbage, quartered, cored and very finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In the bowl of a food processor, combine the apple, bell pepper and celery and pulse until very finely chopped. Transfer to a nonreactive bowl and add the vinegar, sugar, celery seed, caraway seed, garlic powder, onion powder, pepper and salt. Stir to combine, and let stand 10 minutes. Stir in mayonnaise and buttermilk and refrigerate 1 hour. Add the green cabbage, red cabbage and carrot and toss. (The slaw is best if made and refrigerated at least 1 hour before serving.)
